hero.title: Hi, I'm Franco
hero.description: With more than 3 years of experience, I help startups and teams launch reliable platforms that adapt to business growth.

about.title: About me
about.personalStory: Full-stack developer with over 3 years of experience building solutions for startups and companies. Based in Amsterdam, I work with modern technologies to create products that generate real impact.
about.newChapter: Specialized in scalable architectures and quality code. I develop web applications that grow with the business, prioritizing maintainability and performance.
about.dedication: Committed to technical excellence: clean code, solid architectures, and exceptional user experiences. Every project is an opportunity to exceed expectations.
about.interests: Passionate about digital product design and technological innovation. Continuously learning to stay current with industry best practices and tools.

aboutPage.buttonText: Would you like to know more about me?
